channel.title: The Anime Chatterbox
channel.description:
[b]STOP! Just let this thread die. If an admin is reading this, please lock this topic.[/b]
Yup. It's a thread for us animefags. But we prefer "otaku". To get this thread started: I like Sgt. Frog. Discussion... GO!

item.title: The Anime Chatterbox
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
I’d ask for some evidence to support this claim but you’ll just spout some stupid bullshit while ignoring me.

Opinion followed by unsupported fact.

You don’t quite get it do you?
No one owes you a flying fuck.
Your shit is not welcome here, simple as that. Not only you fail to understand that, but you creeps keep making a thread after thread.
If anyone needs to support several claims - it’s you. All we’ve heard from you yet are “oh you’re so clueless” “you’re so ignorant” “bullshit” squeels of a typical, pretentious animefag. You want us to back our claims up with points, yet you’ve YET to make one.

If you’re so inclined to prove us wrong, then go ahead and do it - go tell us how anime is awesome and how it warrants a special place here.

Oh, but you can’t be bothered, right? Then this may work:

Not that if you would actually go ahead and do it, that would change anything.

Read full topic

item.title: The Anime Chatterbox
item.dc:creator: Kairouseki
item.description:
SassyRobot:

You could just NOT sum up the argument like this because you know, you’ve made most of that up.

I could say the same about everything you say about anime/manga.

Manga is shit because it is GENERIC. It’s the same stories, the same artwork, the same shit over and over. I don’t usually argue with people about this because hey, it’s an opinion thing but God damn, you bastards are just everyfuckingwhere on the forum. How many threads do you want? Even then you still talk about it in the chat thread too.

I’d ask for some evidence to support this claim but you’ll just spout some stupid bullshit while ignoring me.

Not all Western comics are good, no one said that. They are generally (in my and I would assume most peoples opinions) worth a lot more than most manga is. They’re readable for starters.

Opinion followed by unsupported fact.

Now, yeah ODB has been posting in here. Why are you grouping up everyone else who doesn’t like anime with him? And by the way, you know as well as I do that you motherfuckers are anything if “underground” or this place wouldn’t be clogged up with your bullshit… also, none of you are “trying to conform” or we wouldn’t keep having this same fucking argument.

Just like everyone who wants to talk about anime on here is lumped into the same group. The only reason it’s everywhere is because you fuckers won’t let one of these threads exist. And I might just mention it every once in awhile but every time I do ODB or someone else throttles me and I just can’t leave it at that.

Here’s a point. Wonderful Siggs, he likes anime. You know how many threads he starts to talk about it? Or how often he clogs up other threads with it?
Never. Which is why I’m happy to respect his taste and opinions because yeah, when asked he’ll talk about it, when in an appropriate place he’ll talk about it, but he doesn’t just make thread after pointless thread for what is, lets face it, a minority. The animefags on this forum are an incredibly small group which is why I just cannot understand why I keep seeing this shit EVERYWHERE.

God forbid I want to talk about something other than what someone else wants to.

Read full topic

item.title: The Anime Chatterbox
item.dc:creator: Kairouseki
item.description:
So, to sum up your argument.

Manga is shit because it has a (though in reality many) unique art style(s) and doesn’t try to be so fucking realistic that it hurts your eyes. Generic American comics are awesome however because they all look the same and are in color.

I guess there’s no way to argue against that.

SassyRobot:

Sorry but, how many F1 threads are there?

There is ONE last time I checked.
Keep your faggotry in one thread and we wouldn’t mind so much, at least you wouldn’t be peddling your filth in the good threads.

Your fucking hypocrisy astounds me. Every time there’s an anime thread ODB and his droogs destroy them and have pretty much forced the few people on here that like it underground to try and conform to your twisted ideas of what a person should be.

Read full topic

item.title: The Anime Chatterbox
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
OldDirtyBastard:

What? As a product it serves its purpose. Its a medium for entertainment and regardless or the quality or people who do get enjoyment out of it, it does entertain. From the suppliers end Japan loves it so I imagine it must be extremely profitable, as far as western countries are concerned they translate it and such so there must be money in it.

Anime’s existence is just as justifiable as any other commercial product.

Read full topic
